item.title: Parallel Processing with POSIX Shell
item.description: N.B. The main example in this post has been updated to use POSIX shell instead of bash. Last week at work I had to whip up a script to process several thousand ids for product analysis on a new feature we’re launching. The processing included making HTTP requests to a service, and I was on a deadline, so the script had to be concurrent. Here’s what I came up with:
